title: On pronunciation of names
content:
A certain question has been plaguing me for months now, and it with the hope of receiving a definitive answer that I write this post.   
   
How, exactly, do you pronounce Adrian Frutiger's surname? Is it /froo'-tijh-er/? Or /frut'-igh-er/? Or some combination thereof?   
   
Or not?   
   
_Jake_

 [‹ Auto-Critique](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013183309/http:/typophile.com/node/1107 "Go to previous forum topic") [Attn - Stuart from FontDiner ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081013183309/http:/typophile.com/node/1081 "Go to next forum topic")
author: jcoleman
